Title: Repeals provision of county law relating to access to records of calls made to a municipality's E911 system
Summary: Relates to access to records of calls made to a municipality's E911 system.
LawCode: Rpld ยง308 sub 4, County L
ActClause: AN ACT to repeal subdivision 4 of section 308 of the county law, relating to access to records of calls made to a municipality's E911 system
